name: gemologist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who studies gems (= stones that are used for making jewellery): Our gemologists ensure that the rocks are authentic. A trained gemologist can tell the difference between a fake diamond and the real thing.
More examplesFewer examplesGemologists around the country want to build a national collection to rival the great jewel collections of Europe.The professor, a geologist and gemologist, curated this exhibition of newly discovered stones.The institute makes specialized equipment for jewellers and gemologists.My father, a keen amateur gemologist, hunted for stones in the river's tumbling waters.
